page.title: 13Sennen Playgroup
page.content: {Sennen Playgroup}is a group for two three and four year olds to learn about things.At{playgroup}they get them ready to go Sennen School.When they come to the School they will know the teachers because the teacher goes to see them before they go to Sennen School.When they go on to Sennen School they stay until they are eleven years old.At the playgroup they have drink and biscuits at ten o,clock in the morning and it starts at nine o,clock and finishes at 12 o,clock. It is good for little people because they like to play and paint and take their picture home for their mums to stick up on the wall and for their older brothers and sisters to see.
